```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(dplyr)

library(here)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv(here("UNLV-MIS-761/ufc-master.csv"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = gender, fill = Winner)) +

```
```{r}
df %>%
  select(gender, Winner) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(`% Win` = n())
```
